entry.title: Performance Game Changer: Browser Back/Forward Cache

entry.title: Resilience, Flexibility And Immediacy: Working With Headless Systems

entry.title: Designing A Better Language Selector

entry.title: How Partytown Eliminates Website Bloat From Third-Party Scripts
entry.summary: Introducing Partytown, a lightweight open-source solution that reduces execution delays due to third-party JavaScript by offloading third-party scripts to web workers, which run in background threads.

entry.title: CTA Modal: How To Build A Web Component
entry.summary: In this article, Nathan Smith explains how to create modal dialog windows with rich interaction that will only require authoring HTML in order to be used. They are based on Web Components that are currently supported by every major browser.
